page.title: 15Armed Forces in Wilton Area
page.content: There is strict security against possible terrorist attack at the Army H.Q. in Wilton.Special arrangements were made for our visit & admission to the site was by high gates normally kept locked.The Public Relations Officer is anxious to present a good image of the Army & its work.We toured the site & the children handled weapons in the armoury.In 1972 the geographical Army Commands (North, South,West & Scottish) were reorganised into 9 districts under one command HQ;UKLF,Erskine Barracks, Wilton.The C-in-C UKLF commands:1.all troops in the UK,2.M.O.D. establish- ments,3.some overseas detachments. He is responsible for training and for operations. The RAF.& RN. are represented at UKLF. Families based at UKLF live locally and send their children to local schools.
